articles.content: India golfer Diksha Dagar created history on Sunday when she won Czech Ladies Open for her second title on Ladies European Tour. With this victory, Dagar also became only the second Indian to have mo… [+4372 chars]

articles.content: 19.3 G Periyaswamy to Silambarasan, byes, 1 run, on a length and outside off, Silambarasan slashes and does not make contact, Raheja fumbles
